org.jenkinsci.lib.configprovider.model.C.name: .kitchen.local.yml
org.jenkinsci.lib.configprovider.model.C.comment: Overrides TestKitchen configuration supplied by cookbooks being tested
org.jenkinsci.lib.configprovider.model.C.content:
--- driver: name: docker
driver_config: provision_command: curl -L https://www.opscode.com/chef/install.sh | bash use_sudo: false
provisioner: require_chef_omnibus: false
